findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: Using an outdated compiler version can be problematic, especially if there are publicly disclosed bugs and issues that affect the current compiler version.

findings.title: Using the approve function of the token standard
findings.description: The approve function of ERC-20 is vulnerable to front-running attacks, allowing approved tokens to be spent before the change of allowance value.

findings.title: Prefer external to public visibility level
findings.description: A function with a public visibility modifier that is not called internally.
